place.name: HACKLETON
place.gazetteerText: HACKLETON, a hamlet in Piddington parish, Northamptonshire; near the Northwestern railway, 5½ miles S E by S of Northampton. Real property, £2, 223. Pop., 535. Houses, 114. There is a Baptist chapel. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
